mapper.insert: insert into T_USER_CONTRACT (ID, USER_NO, CONTRACT_NO, OPEN_CHARGE, CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE, CLOSE_LAST_CHARGE, MARGIN, CONTRACT_UNIT, TICK_SIZE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, OPEN_CHARGE_RATE, CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE_RATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closeCurrCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closeLastCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{margin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractUnit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tickSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openChargeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closeCurrChargeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update T_USER_CONTRACT
USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_CHARGE = #{openCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE = #{closeCurrCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLOSE_LAST_CHARGE = #{closeLastCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MARGIN = #{margin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRACT_UNIT = #{contractUnit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TICK_SIZE = #{tickSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPEN_CHARGE_RATE = #{openChargeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE_RATE = #{closeCurrChargeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_USER_CONTRACT set USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_CHARGE = #{openCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE = #{closeCurrCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLOSE_LAST_CHARGE = #{closeLastCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MARGIN = #{margin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACT_UNIT = #{contractUnit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TICK_SIZE = #{tickSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPEN_CHARGE_RATE = #{openChargeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE_RATE = #{closeCurrChargeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.CONTRACT_NO, t.OPEN_CHARGE, t.CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE, t.CLOSE_LAST_CHARGE, t.MARGIN, t.CONTRACT_UNIT, t.TICK_SIZE, t.OPEN_CHARGE_RATE, t.CLOSE_CURR_CHARGE_RATE from T_USER_CONTRACT t,T_USER_INFO t1 where t.USER_NO = T1.user_NO and t1.USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.*,t1.USER_NAME from T_USER_CONTRACT t,T_USER_INFO t1 where t.USER_NO = t1.USER_NO
